metadata.title: CVE-2023-50447 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Pillow through 10.1.0 allows PIL.ImageMath.eval Arbitrary Code Executionvia the environment parameter, a different vulnerability thanCVE-2022-22817 (which was about the expression parameter).

criterions.comment: pillow: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
